Inexorable Advance.name: Inexorable Advance
Inexorable Advance.flavor: You relentlessly pound through and past your foes.
Inexorable Advance.effect: You can shift 1 square before each attack.
Inexorable Advance.weapon: If youâ€™re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attacks deal extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Line-Breaker Assault.name: Line-Breaker Assault
Line-Breaker Assault.flavor: our hammering strike knocks your foe where you want it and leaves it staggering.
Line-Breaker Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares to an adjacent space. The target is dazed (save ends).
Line-Breaker Assault.effect: You gain resist 5 to all damage until the start of your next turn.

Blood Iron.name: Blood Iron
Blood Iron.flavor: Detaching your mind from your injuries, you ignore minor wounds for the rest of the battle.
Blood Iron.effect: You gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of the encounter.
